sourcesContent:
Campaign Details

{campaigns.map((campaign) => (

{campaign.id}. {campaign.name}

handleFormChange(e, campaign.id, "quantity")} style={{ display: 'inline-block', width: '100px', marginRight: '10px' }} /> handleFormChange(e, campaign.id, "amount")} style={{ display: 'inline-block', width: '100px' }} />
))}
